name: The Regular
description:
Welcome to your new job at the trendiest new craft beer bar downtown!

The regulars can be kinda chatty, but if you can ignore them you can hopefully make enough money in tips to pay rent. Or spend some of the money going out, because you never know what awesome thing might happen during a night on the town. But you should probably save some cash, those student loans aren't going to pay themselves off.

Features: Nearly every craft beer imaginable
